transcript: I don't get it. The first time we came here you said it was the best night of your life. And last year I remember distinctly you were so excited about coming that you stubbed your toy toe pushing me out the door and didn't even notice until you got in the car.

segments.text: The first time we came here you said it was the best night of your life.
And last year I remember distinctly you were so excited about coming that you stubbed
your toy toe pushing me out the door and didn't even notice until you got in the car.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't get it.  I mean, the first time we came you said it was the best night of your life. And last year I remember distinctly you were so excited about coming that you stubbed your toe toe pushing me out the door and you didn't even notice until you got in the car.
